POISON
Usage : cast 'poison' <victim | food | drink> Accumulative: Yes on persons. Duration : Level hours, or permanent on food and drinks. Level : Cleric Level 8, Mage level 14.
Casting poison on food or drink (containers) will poison it. Eating poisoned food/drinks will poison the person eating or drinking.
A person who is poisoned will suffer damage every hour, lose strength, and gain less points than usual.
See also: "REMOVE POISON", "DETECT POISON"
